trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Web.ApplicationServices" /> namespace provides classes that enable you to access ASP.NET forms authentication, roles, and profiles application services as Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) services.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Web.ApplicationServices" /> 命名空间提供了一些类，通过这些类可以访问 ASP.NET 窗体身份验证、角色和配置文件应用程序服务，如 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService>, and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService> classes contain methods that let you log on users, check which roles the current user belongs to, and retrieve profile properties for the user through WCF services.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>， <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService>，和<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService>类包含的方法，可让您登录用户、 检查哪些角色当前用户属于，和检索用户通过 WCF 服务的配置文件属性。

trans-unit.source: The namespace also includes the following classes:
trans-unit.target: 命名空间还包含以下类：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs>, which is used to customize the authentication cookie from the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs>它用于自定义身份验证 cookie 从<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs>, which is used to select the membership provider at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs>用于在运行时选择成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs>, which is used to select the role provider at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs>用于在运行时选择的角色提供程序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs>, which is used to create custom validation for user profile properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs>用于创建自定义验证的用户配置文件属性。
